title: Mystery of the Mermaid
description: A luxury cruise ship hosts modern day romance, mystery, and suspense. Hallie Marsh, a young single woman who has it all, suddenly finds herself a breast cancer survivor. Her wit keeps her calm and on course. Hoping to adjust to her new body image, she takes a luxury cruise. But strange things happen on a passenger disappears, a body turns up in a cabin, and a handsome journalist romances her unexpectedly.
author: Merla Zellerbach
